info.name: OpenResty detection
author: jcockhren
info.description: Some deployments of OpenResty spill their version numbers.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: app.pix.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Accept-Ranges: bytes Age: 0 Cache-Control: no-cache Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Datacenter: pa2.par Date: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 03:10:39 GMT Etag: W/"62fce08e-15e3" Expires: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 03:10:38 GMT Last-Modified: Wed, 17 Aug 2022 12:35:26 GMT Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin Server: openresty Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: Accept-Encoding Via: 1.1 varnish (Varnish/6.5) X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Request-Id: 86327d82-8333-4e33-8477-70ff0192f03e X-Robots-Tag: noindex X-Varnish: 928206767 X-Xss-Protection: 1 Pix

info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:

Host: app.pix.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54724
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;app.pix.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54724
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;app.pix.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
app.pix.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	pix-app.baleen.cshield.net.
pix-app.baleen.cshield.net.	300	IN	TXT	"_placeholder"

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:

app.pix.fr.	10800	IN	CNAME	pix-app.baleen.cshield.net.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: app.pix.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Not Allowed Connection: close Content-Length: 150 Age: 0 Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Datacenter: pa2.par Date: Sun, 21 Aug 2022 03:13:27 GMT Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin Server: openresty Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Via: 1.1 varnish (Varnish/6.5) X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Request-Id: c082e49f-6e7a-405b-835f-6272fcf3624f X-Varnish: 577308850 X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: app.pix.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://app.pix.fr/'
